---
title: "Acetylation ODEs"
output:
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
---

## Ac-CoA1
PDHA1 + ACSS1 - ACOT13 - CS
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAc-CoA1}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, PDHA1} \times [PDHA1] \times [Pyruvate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, PDHA1, Pyruvate}+ [Pyruvate]) \times (K_{m, PDHA1, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, ACSS1} \times [ACSS1] \times [Acetate] \times (15 - [Ac-CoA1])}{(K_{m, ACSS1, Acetate} + [Acetate]) \times (K_{m, ACSS1, CoA} + (15 - [Ac-CoA1])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACOT13} \times [ACOT13] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{K_{m, ACOT13, Ac-CoA1} + [Ac-CoA1]}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, CS} \times [CS] \times [OXa] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{(K_{m, CS, OXa} + [OXa]) \times (K_{m, CS, Ac-CoA1} + [Ac-CoA1])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Citrate
CS - ACO2 - ACLY
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dCitrate}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, CS} \times [CS] \times [OXa] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{(K_{m, CS, OXa} + [OXa]) \times (K_{m, CS, Ac-CoA1} + Ac-CoA1)}\\
&- (\frac{K_{cat, ACO2_1} \times [ACO2] \times [Citrate]}{(K_{m, ACO2, Citrate} + [Citrate]} - \frac{K_{cat, ACO2_2} \times [ACO2] \times [Isocitrate]}{K_{m, ACO2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]})\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACLY} \times [ACLY] \times [Citrate]}{K_{m, ACLY, Citrate} + [Citrate]}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Isocitrate
ACO2 - IDH2
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dIsocitrate}{dt} = &(\frac{K_{cat, ACO2_1} \times [ACO2] \times [Citrate]}{K_{m, ACO2, Citrate} + [Citrate]} - \frac{K_{cat, ACO2_2} \times [ACO2] \times [Isocitrate]}{K_{m, ACO2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]})\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, IDH2} \times [IDH2] \times [Isocitrate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, IDH2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]) \times (K_{m, IDH2, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Alpha-KG
IDH2 - OGDH
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAlphaKG}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, IDH2} \times [IDH2] \times [Isocitrate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, IDH2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]) \times (K_{m, IDH2, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, OGDH} \times [OGDH] \times [AlphaKG] \times [NAD^+])}{(K_{m, OGDH, AlphaKG} + [AlphaKG]) \times (K_{m, OGDH, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## OXa
OGDH + PC - CS
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dOXa}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, OGDH} \times [OGDH] \times [AlphaKG] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, OGDH, AlphaKG} + [AlphaKG]) \times (K_{m, OGDH, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, PC} \times [PC] \times [Pyruvate] \times [HCO_3^-])}{(K_{m, PC, Pyruvate} + [Pyruvate]) \times (K_{m, PC, HCO_3^-} + [HCO_3^-])}\\
&- \frac{((K_{cat, CS} \times [CS] \times [OXa] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{(K_{m, CS, OXa} + [OXa]) \times (K_{m, CS, Ac-CoA1} + [Ac-CoA1])}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Ac-CoA2
ACLY + ACSS2 - ACACA - HMGCS1 - KAT2A - ACOT12
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAc-CoA2}{dt} = &\frac{K_{cat, ACLY} \times [ACLY] \times [Citrate]}{K_{m, ACLY, Citrate} + [Citrate]} \\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, ACSS2} \times [ACSS2] \times [Acetate] \times (15 - [Ac-CoA2]}{(K_{m, ACSS2, Acetate} + [Acetate]) \times (K_{m, ACSS2, CoA} + (15 - [Ac-CoA2]))}\\
&- \frac{2 \times K_{cat, ACACA} \times [Ac-CoA2] \times [ACACA] \times [HCO_3^-]}{(K_{m, ACACA, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]) \times (K_{m, ACACA, HCO_3^-} + [HCO_3^-])}\\
&-\frac{(K_{cat, HMGCS1} \times [HMGCS1] \times [Ac-CoA2] \times [Ac-CoA2]}{(K_{m, HMGCS1, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]) \times (K_{m, HMGCS1, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, KAT2A} \times [KAT2A] \times [Ac-CoA2]}{K_{m, KAT2A, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACOT12} \times [ACOT12] \times [Ac-CoA2])}{K_{m, ACOT12, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]}
\end{aligned}
$$

## Acetate
SLC16A3 + HDAC1 + HDAC2 + HDAC3 + ACOT13 + ACOT12 - ACSS1 - ACSS2
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dAcetate}{dt} = &88.07\\
&+ K_{cat, HDAC1} \times HDAC1\\
&+ K_{cat, HDAC2} \times HDAC2\\
&+ K_{cat, HDAC3} \times HDAC3\\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, ACOT13} \times [ACOT13] \times [Ac-CoA1]}{K_{m, ACOT13, Ac-CoA1} + [Ac-CoA1]}\\
&+ \frac{K_{cat, ACOT12} \times [ACOT12] \times [Ac-CoA2]}{K_{m, ACOT12, Ac-CoA2} + [Ac-CoA2]}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACSS1} \times [ACSS1] \times [Acetate] \times (15 - [Ac-CoA1])}{(K_{m, ACSS1, Acetate} + [Acetate]) \times (K_{m, ACSS1, CoA} + (15 - [Ac-CoA1]))}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, ACSS2} \times [ACSS2] \times [Acetate] \times (15 - [Ac-CoA2])}{(K_{m, ACSS2, Acetate} + [Acetate]) \times (K_{m, ACSS2, CoA} + (15 - [Ac-CoA2]))}
\end{aligned}
$$

## $NAD^+$
v_NAD - PDHA1 - IDH2 - OGDH
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{dNAD}{dt} = &\frac{0.20844 - (0.0012 \times [NAD^+])}{85}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, PDHA1} \times [PDHA1] \times [Pyruvate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, PDHA1, Pyruvate} + [Pyruvate]) \times (K_{m, PDHA1, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, IDH2} \times [IDH2] \times [Isocitrate] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, IDH2, Isocitrate} + [Isocitrate]) \times (K_{m, IDH2, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}\\
&- \frac{K_{cat, OGDH} \times [OGDH] \times [AlphaKG] \times [NAD^+]}{(K_{m, OGDH, AlphaKG} + [AlphaKG]) \times (K_{m, OGDH, NAD^+} + [NAD^+])}
\end{aligned}
$$
